messages.content: दाक्ष बागेत काडी परिपक्व  होण्यासाठी कोणता spray ghayvya
messages.en: Which spray to mature in the garden
messages.standalone_question: What spray should be used for the proper maturity of the daaksh plant in the garden?
messages.standalone_en: What spray should be used for the proper maturity of the daaksh plant in the garden?
messages.content_transliterated: daksh baget kadi paripakva honyasathi konta spray ghayvya

messages.content: तुमच्या दाक्ष बागेत काडी परिपक्व होण्यासाठी सध्या कोणताही स्प्रे शेड्यूल केलेला नाही. तुम्ही फक्त फ्यलो अॅपच्या सूचना लक्षात ठेवा. जर तुम्हाला काही विशिष्ट समस्या असल्यास, तर कृपया सांगा.
messages.en: There is currently no spray scheduled for the stick to mature in your southern garden. All you have to do is remember the instructions in the Fallo app. If you have any specific issues, please let me know.

messages.content: कानाच्या शिरा लाल होऊन पाणी पिवळी पडतात
messages.en: The veins of the ear become red and the water turns yellow
messages.standalone_question: Why do the veins in the ear turn red and the fluid become yellow?
messages.standalone_en: Why do the veins in the ear turn red and the fluid become yellow?
messages.content_transliterated: kanachya shira lal houn pani pivali padatat

messages.content: कानाच्या शिरा लाल होणे आणि पाणी पिवळी पडणे हे काही रोग किंवा कीटकांच्या आक्रमणाचे लक्षण असू शकते. यासाठी, कृपया तुमच्या पिकाचे एक छायाचित्र अपलोड करा, जेणेकरून मी त्याचे विश्लेषण करू शकू आणि योग्य सल्ला देऊ शकू.
messages.en: Reddening of the ear veins and yellowing of the water may be a sign of some disease or insect invasion. For this, please upload a picture of your crop, so that I can analyze it and give appropriate advice.

messages.en: How is this.

messages.standalone_en: What is your opinion on this?

messages.en: Hello S Ramachandran Reddy! How can I assist you with your farming needs today? If you have any questions or need guidance regarding your pomegranate crop or plot management, feel free to ask!

messages.content: आपल्या प्लॉटसाठी या आठवड्यात कोणतीही फवारणीची शिफारस नाही. त्यामुळे सध्या फवारणीची आवश्यकता नाही.
messages.en: There are no spraying recommendations for your plot this week. Therefore, there is no need for spraying at the moment.

messages.standalone_en: What is "Fatireges"?

messages.content:
आपल्या प्लॉट "Manikchaman" साठी फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल खालीलप्रमाणे आहे:

### सध्याचा फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल (आठवडा 1)
**पिकाचे नाव:** द्राक्षे  
**सुरुवात तारीख:** 3 जुलै 2025  
**सध्याचा टप्पा:** टॉपिंग

#### फोलिअर पद्धतीने:
- **फर्टिलायझर:** 
  - फेरस सल्फेट: 500 ग्रॅम/एकर
  - मँगनीज सल्फेट: 500 ग्रॅम/एकर
- **टीप:** फोलिअर स्प्रेमध्ये सूक्ष्म पोषक तत्वांचा एकाग्रता 1% पेक्षा जास्त नसावा, उदाहरणार्थ 500 लिटर पाण्यात 5 किलो.

#### फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:
- **फर्टिलायझर:** 
  - मॅग्नेशियम सल्फेट: 2 किलो/एकर
  - फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल 80%: 3 किलो/एकर
- **टीप:** फॉस्फोरिक आम्ल इतर फर्टिलायझर्सच्या अनुप्रयोगापूर्वी 15-20 मिनिटे स्वतंत्रपणे लागू करावे.

### पुढील फर्टिगेशन शेड्यूल (आठवडा 2)
**सुरुवात तारीख:** 2 ऑक्टोबर 2025

#### फोलिअर पद्धतीने:
- **फर्टिलायझर:** 
  - झिंक ऑक्साइड: 200 ग्रॅम/एकर

#### फर्टिगेशन पद्धतीने:
- **फर्टिलायझर:** 
  - मॅग्नेशियम सल्फेट: 2 किलो/एकर
  - सल्फेट ऑफ पोटाश: 6.5 किलो/एकर

आपल्या द्राक्षांच्या पिकासाठी योग्य फर्टिगेशन पद्धतींचा वापर करून अधिक उत्पादन मिळवू शकता.
messages.en:
The fertigation schedule for your plot "Manikchaman" is as follows:

### Current Fertigation Schedule (Week 1)
**Name of the crop:** Grapes  
**Start date:** July 3, 2025  
**Current stage:** Topping

#### In a Folier way:
- **Fertilizer:** 
  Ferrous sulfate: 500 g/acre
  Manganese sulfate: 500 g/acre
* **Note:* The concentration of micronutrients in foliar spray should not exceed 1%, for example 5 kg in 500 liters of water.

#### In a fertigation manner:
- **Fertilizer:** 
  - Magnesium sulfate: 2 kg/acre
  Phosphoric acid 80%: 3 kg/acre
- **Note:** Phosphoric acid should be applied separately for 15-20 minutes before application to other fertilizers.

### Next Fertigation Schedule (Week 2)
**Start date:** October 2, 2025

#### In a Folier way:
- **Fertilizer:** 
  - Zinc oxide: 200 g/acre

#### In a fertigation manner:
- **Fertilizer:** 
  - Magnesium sulfate: 2 kg/acre
  - Sulfate of Potash: 6.5 kg/acre

You can get more yield by using the right fertigation methods for your grape crop.

messages.content_transliterated: whatapp par alert bheje kisi keat bimari ke aane se pahle

messages.content:
किसी कीट या बीमारी के आने से पहले अलर्ट भेजने के लिए, आपको पहले कीट और बीमारी की भविष्यवाणी की जानकारी की आवश्यकता होगी। मैं आपके लिए कीटों की भविष्यवाणी की जानकारी प्राप्त कर सकता हूँ। 

क्या आप "jaiswal tomato plot" या "J.A muskmelon plot" में से किसी एक के लिए कीट भविष्यवाणी की जानकारी चाहते हैं?
messages.en:
To send an alert before a pest or disease arrives, you'll first need pest and disease prediction information. I can get insect prediction information for you. 

Are you looking for pest prediction information for either "jaiswal tomato plot" or "J.A muskmelon plot"?

messages.content: second
messages.en: second
messages.standalone_question: Would you like pest prediction information for the "J.A muskmelon plot"?
messages.standalone_en: Would you like pest prediction information for the "J.A muskmelon plot"?

tools:
get_historical_pest_prediction_metrics  
Returns the historical daily crop pest prediction metrics for the given pests, checking all dependent parameters inherently.
faq:
Q: What is the pest prediction?
A: Check the all pest predictions relevant. We support Aphids, Banana aphids, Bihar hairy caterpillar, Broad mites, Brown plant hopper, Capsule borer, Caterpillar,
   Citrus Psylla, Cut worm, Early shoot borer, European red mites, Flat mites, Flea Beetle, Flea beetle, Fruit Borer,
   Fruit Fly, Fruit borer, Fruit fly, Green aphids, Hispa beetle, Jassids, Leaf eating caterpillar, Leaf folder, Leaf miner,
   Leaf roller, Mango hopper, Mealy Bug, Mealy bug, Mealybug, Mites, Perianth mites, Pin worm, Pink bollworm,
   Pseudostem weevil, Red Spider Mites, Red palm weevil, Red spider mites, Rhinoceros beetle, Rhizome weevil, Root Grubs,
   Root knot nematode, Rugose spiraling whitefly, Rust mites, Rust thrips, Scale Insects, Scale insects, Scarring beetle,
   Shoot borer, Skipper, Spiraling whitefly, Spodoptera, Stem Borer, Stem borer, Striped beetle, Striped cucumber beetle,
   Tea Mosquitto Bug, Tea mosquitto bug, Termite, Thrips, White Fly, White fly, Whitefly, and Wooly aphids.

Q: What pests predictions does fyllo support?
A: Fyllo supports the following pests:
   Aphids, Banana aphids, Bihar hairy caterpillar, Broad mites, Brown plant hopper, Capsule borer, Caterpillar,
   Citrus Psylla, Cut worm, Early shoot borer, European red mites, Flat mites, Flea Beetle, Flea beetle, Fruit Borer,
   Fruit Fly, Fruit borer, Fruit fly, Green aphids, Hispa beetle, Jassids, Leaf eating caterpillar, Leaf folder, Leaf miner,
   Leaf roller, Mango hopper, Mealy Bug, Mealy bug, Mealybug, Mites, Perianth mites, Pin worm, Pink bollworm,
   Pseudostem weevil, Red Spider Mites, Red palm weevil, Red spider mites, Rhinoceros beetle, Rhizome weevil, Root Grubs,
   Root knot nematode, Rugose spiraling whitefly, Rust mites, Rust thrips, Scale Insects, Scale insects, Scarring beetle,
   Shoot borer, Skipper, Spiraling whitefly, Spodoptera, Stem Borer, Stem borer, Striped beetle, Striped cucumber beetle,
   Tea Mosquitto Bug, Tea mosquitto bug, Termite, Thrips, White Fly, White fly, Whitefly, and Wooly aphids.

Q: How does the device predict diseases and pests?
A: It captures data from different parameters using sensors and analyzes it using various agronomical algorithms, including different models for all diseases and pests.
   Each disease and pest has a specific etymology, which is the suitable environment for its incidence.

messages.content:
### Pest Prediction for Your Plots

#### 1. **Jaiswal Tomato Plot**
- **Pest Metrics:** Not available for this plot.

#### 2. **J.A Muskmelon Plot**
Here are the pest predictions for the last few days:

- **July 4, 2025:**
  - **Aphids:** Probability 29.4% (Risk Level: LOW)
  - **Shoot Fruit Borer:** Probability 62.3% (Risk Level: MEDIUM)
  - **Thrips:** Probability 45.0% (Risk Level: LOW)
  - **Red Spider Mites:** Probability 63.9% (Risk Level: MEDIUM)
  - **Jassids:** Probability 83.1% (Risk Level: HIGH)

- **July 2, 2025:**
  - **Fruit Fly:** Probability 64.8% (Risk Level: MEDIUM)
  - **Striped Cucumber Beetle:** Probability 98.3% (Risk Level: HIGH)
  - **White Fly:** Probability 45.1% (Risk Level: LOW)
  - **Thrips:** Probability 68.6% (Risk Level: MEDIUM)
  - **Aphids:** Probability 27.1% (Risk Level: LOW)
  - **Leaf Miner:** Probability 47.1% (Risk Level: LOW)
  - **Jassids:** Probability 81.7% (Risk Level: HIGH)

- **July 1, 2025:**
  - **Fruit Fly:** Probability 63.2% (Risk Level: MEDIUM)
  - **Striped Cucumber Beetle:** Probability 93.6% (Risk Level: HIGH)
  - **White Fly:** Probability 47.5% (Risk Level: LOW)
  - **Thrips:** Probability 68.2% (Risk Level: MEDIUM)
  - **Aphids:** Probability 29.9% (Risk Level: LOW)
  - **Leaf Miner:** Probability 49.5% (Risk Level: LOW)
  - **Jassids:** Probability 80.9% (Risk Level: HIGH)

### Recommendations
- **High Risk:** Focus on managing Jassids and Striped Cucumber Beetles as they have high probabilities.
- **Medium Risk:** Monitor Red Spider Mites and Shoot Fruit Borer closely.

Would you like to set up alerts for these pests on WhatsApp? If yes, please confirm the plot for which you want the alerts.

messages.content: आत्ता पाऊस आहेत का
messages.en: Is it raining now?
messages.standalone_question: Is it raining right now?
messages.standalone_en: Is it raining right now?

messages.content:
आज, 4 जुलै 2025 रोजी, तुमच्या सर्व प्लॉट्समध्ये पाऊस झाला आहे. विशेषतः, 3:00 वाजता 1 मिमी पाऊस झाला. तथापि, सध्या पाऊस होत नाही. 

तुमच्या प्लॉट्समध्ये आर्द्रता 99% आहे, त्यामुळे पाण्याची गरज कमी आहे.
messages.en:
Today, July 4, 2025, all your plots have received rain. In particular, 1 mm of rain occurred at 3:00. However, it is not raining at the moment. 

The humidity in your plots is 99%, so the water requirement is less.

messages.content: स्प्रे करायचा आहे घेऊ का
messages.en: Do you want to spray?
messages.standalone_question: Should I spray?
messages.standalone_en: Should I spray?

faq:
Q: Do I need to spray?
A: Check the disease pest spray schedule for the farmer and reply accordingly. Don't check metrics, only pre-defined schedules to be checked.

Q: I already took spray for this pest, but it is still showing high prediction/chances, why?
A: Taking a spray does not affect the prediction calculation. If you have already sprayed based on the fyllo notification,
   then wait a few days, if the fyllo app still recommends spray, only then spray again. Don't give any other reasons.

Q: Can fungicide and insecticide be sprayed together?
A: For fungicides and insecticides to be sprayed together, it is important to consider factors like compatibility. For expert guidance tailored to your situation, we recommend reaching out to Fyllo’s CRM number for personalized advice.

messages.content:
तुमच्या प्लॉटसाठी स्प्रे करण्याची शिफारस आहे, विशेषतः "Plot No 1 SSN" साठी, जिथे तुम्हाला पावसामुळे "Powdery mildew" आणि "Downy mildew" यांसारख्या रोगांवर नियंत्रण ठेवण्यासाठी स्प्रे करणे आवश्यक आहे. 

तुमच्या प्लॉटसाठी स्प्रे करण्याची स्थिती खालीलप्रमाणे आहे:

- **Plot No 1 SSN**: 
  - **स्प्रे स्थिती**: सध्या "WORST" स्थिती आहे (10:30 वाजता). 
  - पुढील काही तासांत (11:30 वाजता) स्थिती "MODERATE" होईल, त्यामुळे तुम्ही त्या वेळेस स्प्रे करू शकता.

- **Plot No 2 SSN** आणि **Plot No 1 Danaka**: 
  - या प्लॉट्ससाठी सध्या "WORST" स्थिती आहे, त्यामुळे स्प्रे करणे टाळा.

तुम्ही "Plot No 1 SSN" साठी 11:30 वाजता स्प्रे करू शकता.
messages.en:
It is recommended to spray for your plot, especially for the "Plot No 1 SSN", where you need to spray to control diseases such as "Powdery mildew" and "Downy mildew" due to rain. 

The spraying conditions for your plot are as follows:

- Plot No 1 SSN: 
  - **Spray Status**: Currently has "WORST" status (at 10:30). 
  - In the next few hours (at 11:30 pm) the status will be "MODERATE", so you can spray at that time.

- **Plot No 2 SSN** and **Plot No 1 Danaka**: 
  - There is currently a "WORST" status for these plots, so avoid spraying.

You can spray for "Plot No 1 SSN" at 11:30.

messages.content: How is health <user uploaded image for analysis at 'vadi774/2025-07-04-1751601681670.jpg'>
messages.en: How is health <user uploaded image for analysis at 'vadi774/2025-07-04-1751601681670.jpg'>
messages.standalone_question: What is the health status indicated in the uploaded image?
messages.standalone_en: What is the health status indicated in the uploaded image?

messages.content:
The analysis of your crop image shows that the young plant has healthy green leaves, indicating good growth. However, there are no clear signs of specific diseases or pest damage visible in the image.

To maintain optimal health, consider the following recommendations:

1. **Weed Management**: There are some grasses around the plant that may compete for nutrients and water. Regular weeding is recommended.
2. **Watering**: Ensure the plant is receiving adequate water, especially in sandy soil, which can drain quickly.
3. **Nutrient Supply**: Monitor the nutrient levels in the soil to ensure the plant is getting the necessary elements for growth.

If you notice any specific symptoms like discoloration, spots, or wilting in the future, please provide a clearer image focusing on those areas for a more detailed analysis.
messages.en:
The analysis of your crop image shows that the young plant has healthy green leaves, indicating good growth. However, there are no clear signs of specific diseases or pest damage visible in the image.

3. **Nutrient Supply**: Monitor the nutrient levels in the soil to ensure the plant is getting the necessary elements for growth.

If you notice any specific symptoms like discoloration, spots, or wilting in the future, please provide a clearer image focusing on those areas for a more detailed analysis.

messages.content:
તમારા છોડની તબિયત સારી છે. તે વેજિટેટિવ સ્ટેજમાં છે અને કોઈ ખાસ રોગ અથવા જીવાતના નિશાન નથી દેખાતા. 

તંદુરસ્તી જાળવવા માટે નીચેના પગલાંઓ પર ધ્યાન આપો:

1. **ઘાસનું સંચાલન**: છોડની આસપાસ ઘાસ છે, જે પોષણ અને પાણી માટે સ્પર્ધા કરી શકે છે. નિયમિત રીતે ઘાસ કાપવું જરૂરી છે.
2. **પાણી આપવું**: ખાતરી કરો કે છોડને પૂરતું પાણી મળે છે, ખાસ કરીને સુકાં સમય દરમિયાન.
3. **પોષણનું સંચાલન**: જમીનમાં પોષણની સ્થિતિની તપાસ કરો અને જરૂર પડે તો ખાતર આપો.

જો તમે કોઈ વિશિષ્ટ લક્ષણો જેમ કે રંગ બદલાવ, સુકાવટ, અથવા જીવાતની હાજરી જુઓ, તો વધુ વિશ્લેષણ માટે વધુ સ્પષ્ટ છબી આપો.
messages.en:
The health of your plants is good. It is in the vegetative stage and does not show any signs of any particular disease or germ. 

Pay attention to the following steps to maintain health:

1. **Managing the grass**: There is grass around the plant, which can compete for nutrition and water. It is necessary to cut the grass regularly.
2. **Watering**: Make sure the plants get enough water, especially during dry spells.
3. **Management of nutrition**: Check the nutritional status in the soil and fertilize if needed.

If you notice any specific features such as color changes, dryness, or the presence of insects, give a more clear image for further analysis.

messages.content: Neck root desace In my plat
messages.en: Neck root desace In my plat
messages.standalone_question: What is the issue with neck root disease in my plot?
messages.standalone_en: What is the issue with neck root disease in my plot?

messages.content:
It seems you are referring to "Neck Root Disease," which can affect crops like pomegranate. This disease is often caused by fungal pathogens and can lead to significant damage.

### Control Measures:
1. **Cultural Practices:**
   - Ensure proper drainage in the field to avoid waterlogging.
   - Maintain good air circulation around the plants.

2. **Chemical Control:**
   - Apply fungicides such as Carbendazim or Thiophanate-methyl as per the recommended dosage.
   - Drench the soil around the affected plants with a suitable fungicide.

3. **Sanitation:**
   - Remove and destroy infected plant parts to prevent the spread of the disease.

4. **Soil Health:**
   - Improve soil health by adding organic matter and ensuring balanced fertilization.

Would you like to proceed with a specific treatment plan or need further assistance?
messages.en:

Would you like to proceed with a specific treatment plan or need further assistance?

messages.content: Spray and drunch
messages.en: Spray and drunch
messages.standalone_question: What is the difference between spraying and drenching in agricultural practices?
messages.standalone_en: What is the difference between spraying and drenching in agricultural practices?

faq:
Q: Do I need to spray?
A: Check the disease pest spray schedule for the farmer and reply accordingly. Don't check metrics, only pre-defined schedules to be checked.

messages.content:
### Spray and Drench Recommendations for "balakrishna pomo" Plot

#### Recommended Spray:
- **Fungicide:** Carbendazim @ 2.5g/liter of water.
- **Insecticide (if needed):** Imidacloprid @ 5-8 ml/kg seeds (for any pest issues).

#### Spray Conditions:
The spray conditions for today are **MODERATE** throughout the day, which means it's a suitable time to spray. Here are the recommended times:
- **Morning:** 9:30 AM to 12:30 PM
- **Afternoon:** 1:30 PM to 4:30 PM
- **Evening:** 5:30 PM to 8:30 PM

#### Application:
- **Drench the soil** around the affected plants with the Carbendazim solution to combat neck root disease.

Make sure to follow the recommended dosages and safety precautions while applying the sprays. If you have any further questions or need assistance, feel free to ask!

#### Recommended Spray:

messages.content:
Here's the rainfall data for yesterday (July 3, 2025) for all divisions except Nero:

| Plot Name               | Rainfall (mm) |
